shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.

section.p: The user becomes offline if the token used in the \ref IRtcEngine::joinChannel "joinChannel" method expires. The SDK triggers this callback 30 seconds before the token expires to remind the application to get a new token.
Upon receiving this callback, generate a new token on the server, and call renewToken to pass the new token to the SDK.

plentry.pd: @param token Pointer to the token that expires in 30 seconds.
